quiz.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect with regards to Tele-MANAS?
options: It was launched on 10th October on World Mental Health Day.
It has a target of opening at least one Tele-MANAS Cell in each state/UT.
National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) will be the nodal centre.
International Institute of Information Technology-Bangalore (IIITB) is providing technical support.
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following helpline number has been set up across the country allowing callers to avail Tele-MANAS services?
options: 14416
14466
13346
12212
10808

quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), the Union Ministry of Ayush & Council of Scientific & Industrial Research-National Institute of Science Communication and Policy Research (CSIR-NIScPR) have organized a special session on Ayurveda@2047. In which of the following years was CSIR-NIScPR established?
options: 2019
2017
2015
2021
2014

quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), National Workshop on ‘Ease of Doing Business’ has been organized by which of the following organizations/ministries?
options: Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Commerce and Industry
Ministry of Corporate Affairs
NITI Aayog
Ministry of Corporate Affairs

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Grameen Udyami Project?

A.     It is also known as Rural Tribal Technical Training Program.

B.      It is an initiative of National Skill Development Corporation under MSDE.

C.      Training is provided to the beneficiaries in 8 disciplines.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship holds how much stake in National Skill Development Corporation?
options: 25%
49%
51%
75%
100%

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the _____________ meeting of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) - India High Level Joint Task Force on Investments has been held in Mumbai.
options: 12th
10th
8th
5th
7th

quiz.text: “Betiyan Bane Kushal” is an initiative of which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
Ministry of Minority Affairs
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: When is the International Day of the Girl Child observed?
options: 9 October
15 October
11 October
19 October
27 October

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Government of India, in consultation with the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), has finalized its borrowing programme for the second half (H2) of FY 2022-23. GoI has planned to borrow how much amount in H2 of FY 2022-23?
options: Rs 5.92 lakh crores
Rs 5.76 lakh crores
Rs 6.42 lakh crores
Rs 7.92 lakh crores
None of the above

quiz.text: North Eastern Handicrafts and Handloom Development Corporation (NEHHDC) mobile app has been launched at the event. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the features of the app?
options: The app helps NEHHDC to register its artisans and weavers online, collect authentic data.
It provides training through online courses & helps in grievance redressal.
It provides important details about Government schemes, initiatives, events, etc.
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Where is the headquarters of NEC located?
options: Aizawl, Mizoram
Shillong, Meghalaya
Itanagar, Arunachal Pradesh
Guwahati, Assam
Agartala, Tripura

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the 6th East Asia Summit (EAS) Education Minister’s Meeting was held in Hanoi, Vietnam. What is the total number of EAS members?
options: 10
7
18
12
15

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to 2nd UNWGIC?

A.     It has been hosted by Department of Science and Technology (DST), Government of India.

B.      It has been organized by United Nations Development Program.

C.      Its theme is ‘Geo-enabling the Global Village: No one should be left behind’.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per the details shared at the event, Rural Development Ministry has mapped over _______________ km of rural roads by using 21 data layers of the map.
options: 29 lakh
25 lakh
15 lakh
45 lakh
37 lakh

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the 34th Meeting of the Joint Working Group (JWG) of Indo-US Vaccine Action Programme (VAP) has been held at National Institutes of Health, United States of America (USA). Indo-US VAP is implemented by which of the following entities?
options: Department of Biotechnology (DBT), India
Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR)
National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), USA
National Institutes of Health (NIH), USA
All of the above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, the World Bank has sanctioned _____________ for Supporting Andhra’s Learning Transformation (SALT) project.
options: USD 250 million
USD 150 million
USD 100 million
USD 200 million
USD 300 million

quiz.text: Which of the following is/are the beneficiaries of the SALT Project?
options: Students between the age of 6 and 14 in government schools
Children between the age of 3 and 6 enrolled in Aanganwadis
Teachers
Aanganwadi Workers
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Ministry of Education, Government of India, has hosted the 6th meeting of the _____________ Joint Working Group on Higher Education in New Delhi?
options: India-Norway

India-New Zealand
India-USA
India-United Kingdom

quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO), an organization of the United Nations (UN), has adopted a new goal to achieve net zero emissions in the aviation industry by which of the following years?
options: 2030
2050
2070
2025
2040

quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), Dr. Reddy’s Laboratories’ largest manufacturing facility in Hyderabad, Telangana has been recognized as part of Global Lighthouse Network (GLN). GLN is an initiative of which of the following organizations?
options: World Bank
World Economic Forum
International Monetary Fund
UNDP
UNEP

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the first conference of the Agni tattva campaign has been organised in which of the following places?
options: Srinagar, Jammu & Kashmir
New Delhi, Delhi
Leh, Ladakh

quiz.text: If the average inflation is more than the upper tolerance level of 6% (or less than the lower tolerance level of 2%), for any ________________, it would mean a 'failure' to achieve the inflation target by the RBI.
options: four consecutive months
two consecutive quarters
six consecutive months
three consecutive quarters
one quarter

options: Reliance Industries Ltd.
Tata Steel
Vedanta Ltd.
JSW Steel
NMDC Ltd.

quiz.text: UNGC initiative encourages companies to conduct business responsibly by aligning their operations and strategies with the UN's _____________ Principles.
options: Nine
Five
Seven
Twelve
Ten

quiz.text: ‘Swastha Balak Spardha’, to identify and celebrate the ‘Healthy child’ thus instilling a sense of competitiveness among children and families for good health and nutritional status has not been successfully piloted in which of the following states during 5th Rashtriya Poshan Maah?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Bihar
Maharashtra
Assam
Madhya Pradesh

quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), the government is planning to expand the scope of Aadhar enrolment of newborns to all the states in the country in the next few months. UID (Unique Identification number) is processed for newborn baby or children below 5 years. These children will need to update their biometrics of ten fingers, iris, and facial photograph, at which of the following age(s)?
options: 5 years
15 years
10 years
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Ministry of Mines has issued General Instructions to Notified Exploration Agencies (NEA) for submission of project proposals to National Mineral Exploration Trust (NMET). NMET was setup in which of the following years?
options: 2015
2019
2021
2017
2011

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the 5th South Asian Geoscience Conference (Biennial), GEO India 2022 has been organised. Which of the following statements is incorrect with regards to the conference?
options: It has been organized in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
It has been organized by Association of Petroleum Geologists (APG) India.
Theme is ‘Fossil Fuels, Decarbonization and Changing Energy Dynamics’.
As per details shared in the conference, India consumes 2 million barrels of petroleum per day.
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (Oct 2022), the National Highways Infra Trust (NHAI InvIT), for the first time, has raised funds through follow-on Issuance, to support National Monetization Plan.

NMP has been developed by ________________ in consultation with Infrastructure line ministries.
options: National Informatics Centre (NIC)
Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
Ministry of Commerce and Industry
World Bank
NITI Aayog
